-e ---

# wend 𓄲 ⇔ wind 𓊡𓏲 < pan 𓊝 < 𓋴𓊪𓈖𓂝𓊛 spin! 𓊜

𓆑 𓈖 𓏏 𓆑 ϥⲉⲛⲧ worm (verb and noun)
𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 𓆙 ϥⲉⲛⲧ snake (verb and noun)

𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓇋 𓇋 | reversal | ܦܢܐ pna פָּנָה pānâ (turn, return) Wende
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓊛 | turn upside down, turn (the eyes against someone) | pöör̃ama
𓊪 𓈖 𓂝 𓈖 𓂝 𓊜 | turn over and over | wenden / kentern 𓊪:kou

𓅱 𓂧 𓃀 𓄲 𓂻|WEND++|turn back, revert|
𓅱 𓂧 𓃀 𓄲 𓂻|wend++|fold over, turn (away from), turn back, revert (to)|fold
𓅱 𓂧 𓃀 𓄲 𓂻|(ab)wend++|divert (illness)|

𓏘 𓄿 𓃀 𓄲 | middle | curba curve 𓏘 𓄿 𓃀 𓄲 | midnight | 𒈪𒁀𒀀 Nacht-Wende 𓏘 𓄿 𓃀 𓄲 | midnight | 𒈪𒁀𒀀 ĝi6-ba-a ĝiba'a
